attributes.action: Keep the 2016 target of Conservative 2015 manifesto pledge of raising asset cap.
attributes.additional_details: People need to trust political parties to not tell lies just to get votes.
attributes.background: This is one manifesto pledge that should not be delayed as it affects a huge number of people. Why should someone who has saved all their life have to pay for their care, when someone who spent everything and saved nothing get it free? 2020 too late. Conservatives may not be elected again.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104992

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
